00044 fsal_status_t  FSAL_static_fsinfo(
00045     fsal_handle_t         *   p_filehandle,       /* IN */
00046     fsal_op_context_t     *   p_context,             /* IN */
00047     fsal_staticfsinfo_t   *   p_staticinfo        /* OUT */
00048 ){
00049   /* sanity checks. */  
00050   if ( !p_staticinfo )
00051     Return( ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_static_fsinfo );
00052   
00053   /* returning static info about the filesystem */
00054   (*p_staticinfo) = global_fs_info;
00055   
00056   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0,INDEX_FSAL_static_fsinfo);
00057   
00058 }

00061 
00080 fsal_status_t  FSAL_dynamic_fsinfo(
00081     fsal_handle_t        * p_filehandle,         /* IN */
00082     fsal_op_context_t    * p_context,               /* IN */
00083     fsal_dynamicfsinfo_t * p_dynamicinfo         /* OUT */
00084 ){
00085   fsal_path_t             pathfsal;
00086   fsal_status_t           status;
00087   struct statvfs          buffstatvfs;
00088   int rc, errsv;
00089     /* sanity checks. */
00090   if ( !p_filehandle ||
00091        !p_dynamicinfo ||
00092        !p_context )
00093     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_dynamic_fsinfo);
00094   
00095   status = fsal_internal_getPathFromHandle(p_context, p_filehandle, 1, &pathfsal, NULL);
00096   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_dynamic_fsinfo);
00097   
00098   TakeTokenFSCall();
00099   rc = statvfs(pathfsal.path, &buffstatvfs);
00100   errsv = errno;
00101   ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00102   if ( rc ) Return(posix2fsal_error(errsv), errsv, INDEX_FSAL_dynamic_fsinfo);
00103   
00104   p_dynamicinfo->total_bytes= buffstatvfs.f_frsize * buffstatvfs.f_blocks;
00105   p_dynamicinfo->free_bytes = buffstatvfs.f_frsize * buffstatvfs.f_bfree;
00106   p_dynamicinfo->avail_bytes= buffstatvfs.f_frsize * buffstatvfs.f_bavail;
00107   
00108   p_dynamicinfo->total_files= buffstatvfs.f_files;
00109   p_dynamicinfo->free_files = buffstatvfs.f_ffree;
00110   p_dynamicinfo->avail_files= buffstatvfs.f_favail;
00111   
00112   p_dynamicinfo->time_delta.seconds = 1;
00113   p_dynamicinfo->time_delta.nseconds = 0;
00114   
00115   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0,INDEX_FSAL_dynamic_fsinfo);
00116   
00117 }
